comments.body:
Is the `LICENSE` file in the tarball? It does not look like it.
If not this won't work.

The error now is b/c conda cannot find the `LICENSE` you specified.
I checked and it is not in the tarball. You can comment this line and add the `LICENSE`
to your `MANIFEST.in` in a future release.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +35,39 @@  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'xarray interface for bpch files'

comments.body:
I was going to mention that the `open_bpchdataset` failed :smile: You were faster!

```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/opt/conda/conda-bld/xbpch_1504277037607/test_tmp/run_test.py", line 5, in <module>
    import xbpch.open_bpchdataset
ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'xbpch.open_bpchdataset'
```

I'm making quick fixes because I'm procrastinating moving my office. I'll need to do a new micro-release to update the tarball on pypi... but if you see anything else wrong with the recipe let me know :) 

Thanks for the help!
